name: Racked Graffiti (Canceled)
blurb: Fast and tough platformer game, with fishing story about ghetto, graffiti and love. Cast: different color spray cans. Bouya!

rewards.reward: Every penny helps! Support the game with \u00a31 and become listed in the credits as a supporter. We will also send you a thank you email with an artwork pdf and your name in it. Thanx a lot!!!\r\n(about $1,6 or \u20ac1,2)
THE GRAFFITI pack: Did you like the demo? Pre-order the DRM free digital copy of the game (also OUYA version), for this extra kickstarter price.\r\n(about $8 or \u20ac6)
THE REAL GANGSTA pack: Get the digital game copy, along with a pdf art book and EARLY BETA GAME ACCESS.\r\n(about $13 or \u20ac10)

THE VOICE OF THE STREETS pack: Do you wanna pick the levels for the final game? Get this reward and you will be able to VOTE for the levels you like most and which you wanna see in the final game. You receive special game build with all produced levels and your role will be, to choose the best ones.\r\nYou also get digital copy of the game, pdf art book and early beta game access. \r\n(about $17,5 or \u20ac13)
THE PICASSO pack: Digital copy of the game PLUS an A2 physical Racked graffiti poster personally signed by one of the game creators.\r\n(about $20 or \u20ac14,5)
THE GAMER pack: Get physical copy of this gangsta graffiti game, with signed label by one of the creators.\r\n(about $20 or \u20ac14,5)
THE ART COLLECTOR pack: You get printed art book, signed by one of the game creators, along with the digital copy of the game.\r\n(about $20 or \u20ac14,5)

THE LIMITED pack: Get three things. Get the art book, along with the poster and physical copy of the game for this special price. Everything with original signature of all the game creators. A real limited collector piece.\r\n(about $47 or \u20ac36)

THE BASIC CREW pack:

Are you ready to be a Beta tester for this game?
 
Become part of the game development process!

You receive a pre - release beta version of the game for testing. Hunt the bugs and give us feedback on the game. We are also interested into your ideas and your name will appear in the credits as a beta tester. You also get your digital copy of the final game.

We want YOU in our team!
(about $63 or €48)

THE ADVANCED CREW pack: INCREDIBLE!!!

If you choose to be the alpha tester, WE WILL RELY ON YOU!
 
We send you alpha version of the game and collect your feedback, what means, that you will work with us from beggining till the end on the game and you will be named in the game credits. You also get your final digital copy of the game.

Welcome in our team!
(about $79 or €60)

THE DESIGNER pack: Let us design a game level together. We create YOUR OWN level, which will be presented in the game. You will be credited as a game designer. You also get DRM free final digital copy of the game.\r\n(about $239 or \u20ac180)

THE ULTIMATE pack: We give out only five pieces of this reward. It is very special one... You make your own level, you become alpha AND beta tester. You also get personalised desktop backround picture, signed poster, designed T-shirt, signed art book and signed version of our game!!! All in one and only for five of you.\r\n(about $479 or \u20ac360)

THE CHIEF pack: Your name in graffiti style will appear on the game start! This is an exlusive reward. Pimp up our game with your name! Your name will also appear in the credits (as the Chief producer), with special thank you quote. You also get the game and big thank you from us.\r\n(about $1815 or \u20ac1320)
